title: Lemon Herb Chicken
steps: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Whisk olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Coat chicken with marinade and rest 10 minutes.
Bake on a sheet pan for 20-25 minutes until cooked through.
Rest 5 minutes before slicing.

title: Spicy Thai Basil Stir-Fry
steps: Heat oil in a wok over high heat.
Stir-fry garlic and shallots until fragrant.
Add ground chicken and cook until browned.
Stir in bell pepper, sauces, and chili paste; cook 2-3 minutes.
Fold in basil until wilted and serve over rice.

title: Margherita Flatbread
steps: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Brush flatbreads with olive oil and spread pizza sauce.
Top with mozzarella and tomatoes; season lightly.
Bake 8-10 minutes until cheese melts and edges crisp.
Finish with fresh basil and a drizzle of olive oil.

title: Vegetable Tikka Masala
steps: Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger in oil until softened.
Stir in tikka masala paste and cook 1 minute.
Add tomato puree and simmer 5 minutes.
Add vegetables, coconut milk, and garam masala; simmer until tender.
Season with salt and garnish with cilantro.

title: Honey Soy Glazed Salmon
ingredients: Sesame seeds and scallions for garnish
steps: Whisk soy sauce, honey, rice vinegar, sesame oil, garlic, and ginger.
Marinate salmon 10-15 minutes.
Sear salmon in a hot skillet, skin-side down first.
Pour in marinade and cook until salmon is glazed and cooked through.
Garnish with sesame seeds and scallions; serve with rice.
